project.name: Math Lessons Platform
project.description: Interactive math education platform with 46 lessons across geometry, algebra, angles, and graphing. React 18 frontend with Redux Toolkit, deployed on Vercel with Heroku backend.

full_access.description: Can read and write all files in the project

code_only.description: Can read and write code files, read-only for configs and docs

read_only.description: Can only read files, cannot make modifications
